description:
“You might be the only one who can’t pass the license test,” Nanaka says to Iori, pointing out what he’s bad at. To avoid being made fun of by Kouhei and Nanaka, he practices secretly. Yet, while practice, all he thinks of is how to poison them at dinner. He avoids being pairs with Kouhei and Aina and gets Chisa to promise to help him with practice. But, these interactions cause misunderstandings…
Source: Amazon
